column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE CAPTURED THE AIRBASE. SEND IN THE TROOPS. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. RUSSIAN REINFORCEMENTS HAVE BEEN REPELLED. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT WE ARE SENDING YOU SOME REINFORCEMENTS. SECURE THE EASTERN SECTOR AND PREPARE FOR ENEMY COUNTER ATTACK. GOOD LUCK. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. EXCELLENT JOB. YOUR MISSION IS ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
